articles.title: UNICEF Says Rich Countries Can Afford To Donate Covax Jabs - NDTV
articles.description: Countries belonging to the G7 and the European Union can afford to donate more than 150 million vaccines to countries in need without compromising their own goals, UNICEF said Monday.
articles.content:
